info.title: Sigilum API
info.description: Agent identity and authorization registry. Manages namespaces, claims, verification, DID resolution, webhooks, and dashboard authentication.

tags.name: Services
tags.description: Service management, API keys, and service webhooks

get.description: Returns health status with current timestamp.

get.summary: List approved claims for authenticated service
get.description: Returns approved claims for the service tied to the provided API key.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Must match the authenticated service slug when provided

get.description: Resolve a namespace to its current metadata and active approved claim count.
List claims for a namespace with optional status/service filtering.

post.description: Submit an authorization request on behalf of an agent. Requires a service API key.

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific claim by ID. Requires namespace-owner authentication.

post.description: Approve a pending claim in your namespace.

get.description: Check whether a public key is currently approved for a service/namespace pair.
Resolve a `did:sigilum:<namespace>` DID to a DID document.

post.description: Clears auth cookie and returns success.

BearerAuth.description: Service API key (sk_live_...) or dashboard JWT
